q: why does the person trim the bushes
pred: The person in the video is trimming the bushes to maintain the appearance of the garden and to prevent the growth of unwanted plants. By trimming the bushes, the person ensures that the garden remains neat and well-maintained, which can enhance the overall aesthetic of the space. Additionally, trimming the bushes can also help prevent the growth of invasive plants, which can damage the garden's ecosystem or pose a threat to other plants and animals. This demonstrates the importance of regular maintenance and care for gardens and landscapes to keep them healthy and visually appealing.
